originalText.text: XinOu was a pleasure to work with for our wedding ceremony. He was very professional and went above and beyond in catering to our every need in order to make possible our dream wedding. He played lovely to which all our guests complimented him and was one of our highlights in our wedding. I would highly recommend him to anyone who is looking for a professional violin player who is caring, understanding and overall a great person. I will definitely be hiring his services for future events.Thank you XinOu for making our day a memorable one!

I will definitely be hiring his services for future events.Thank you XinOu for making our day a memorable one!

originalText.text:
I recently had the pleasure of hiring a string quartet for my son’s 100th-day birthday celebration, and I must say, they were nothing short of amazing. The ambiance they created was both elegant and heartwarming, perfectly complementing the significance of the occasion.

What stood out most was the lead violinist. Not only was their performance mesmerizing, but their accommodating nature truly enhanced our experience. They seamlessly adapted to the mood of the event, playing with a passion and precision that captivated all of our guests. The music was a beautiful backdrop to the celebration, filling the room with a blend of classical and contemporary tunes that were both uplifting and soothing.

Their professionalism and skill were evident from the first note to the last, and their ability to engage with the audience was remarkable. It’s rare to find such talent paired with a genuine willingness to cater to the specific needs of an event. The quartet as a whole, led by this outstanding violinist, added a touch of sophistication and joy to my son’s special day.

I would highly recommend them to anyone looking for a high-quality musical experience. Their performance was not just heard, but felt, leaving a lasting impression on all who attended.”

originalText.text: I cannot express how amazing XinOu was! First of all, the communication is excellent. Secondly, his timing/time management is perfect. Lastly and most importantly, he listens and values your opinion and encourages you to take part in how and what songs you wish to be played. My song of choice to be played during my fiancé and I’s proposal was, “The Way You Look Tonight(Slow Version)”, which I appreciated him inquiring about my opinion. I would definitely recommend and would definitely reach out to XinOu again for other events in the future.

originalText.text: XinOu Was great!!! He arrived early and was ready to go. He pushed my proposal to the next level. He played the song I requested beautifully. I’m still receiving compliments. I would definitely recommend Xinou. Thanks for making the day even better.

originalText.text: XinOu was amazingly talented and very professional. He graciously asked all the right questions to make our wedding experience unforgettable. He played the complicated compositions we requested with ease. His music was beautiful. I would gladly hire him again and most likely will for future events. :)
